articles.title: Risky sexual behaviour, STIs rising despite COVID-19 pandemic: Study - Times Now
articles.description: A new study has found that the COVID-19 pandemic, despite lockdown and advice on Social/Physical distancing, did not inhibit risky behaviours and that acute STIs actually increased.
